# Assignment I


::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_d2f547d167ad523e57e68e0537398b4c'}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Given probabilities
P_T <- 0.8  # Probability of being on time
P_Tbar <- 0.2  # Probability of not being on time
P_S <- 0.3  # Probability of a change in scope
P_Sbar <- 0.7  # Probability of no change in scope

# Calculating probabilities
P_T_and_S <- P_T * P_S
P_T_and_Sbar <- P_T * P_Sbar
P_Tbar_and_S <- P_Tbar * P_S
P_Tbar_and_Sbar <- P_Tbar * P_Sbar

# Sum of probabilities
sum_of_probabilities <- P_T_and_S + P_T_and_Sbar + P_Tbar_and_S + P_Tbar_and_Sbar

# Displaying the results
cat("P(T ∩ S):", P_T_and_S, "\n")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> P(T ∩ S): 0.24
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cat("P(T ∩ S'): ", P_T_and_Sbar, "\n")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> P(T ∩ S'):  0.56
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cat("P(T' ∩ S):", P_Tbar_and_S, "\n")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> P(T' ∩ S): 0.06
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}

```

```
#> P(T' ∩ S'):  0.14
```

# Assignment II

::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_662fa851d81a9aee65f59168d1116e55'}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Given probabilities
P_A <- 0.423
P_B <- 0.278
P_C <- 0.1
P_A_intersect_B <- 0.073
P_B_intersect_C <- 0.033
P_A_intersect_C <- 0.088
P_A_intersect_B_intersect_C <- 0.005

# Percentage of customers using all three devices
P_all_three <- P_A_intersect_B_intersect_C * 100
P_all_three
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> [1] 0.5
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Calculate the percentage of customers using at least two devices
P_at_least_two <- (P_A + P_B + P_C - P_A_intersect_B - P_B_intersect_C - P_A_intersect_C + P_A_intersect_B_intersect_C) * 100
P_at_least_two
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> [1] 61.2
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Calculate the percentage of customers using only one device
P_only_one <- (P_A - P_A_intersect_B - P_A_intersect_C + P_A_intersect_B_intersect_C 
               + P_B - P_A_intersect_B - P_B_intersect_C + P_A_intersect_B_intersect_C 
                 + P_C - P_A_intersect_C -P_B_intersect_C + P_A_intersect_B_intersect_C) * 100
P_only_one
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> [1] 42.8
```
:::

# Assignment III

::: {.cell hash='01_probability_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_b9e11d123550c36c5d20f953adcb9124'}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Given probabilities
P_B_A <- 0.97
P_B_notA <- 0.01
P_A <- 0.04
not_P_A <- 1 - P_A

# Calculate the probability B
P_B <- P_B_A * P_A + P_B_notA* not_P_A
P_B
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> [1] 0.0484
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Calculate the probability A|B
P_A_B <- P_B_A * P_A /P_B
P_A_B
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> [1] 0.8016529
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Calculate the probability not_A|B
P_not_A_B <- P_B_notA * not_P_A / P_B
P_not_A_B
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> [1] 0.1983471
```
:::
